description: The demons rebel against the gods, therefore Odin-sama`s fervent servant, http://anidb.net/perl-bin/animedb.pl?show=character&charid=55402 [Valkyrie] is sent to eradicate the vile beings, but Valkyrie is betrayed by http://anidb.net/perl-bin/animedb.pl?show=character&charid=55403 [Freya-sama], therefore she is captured. Valkyrie is unwilling to cooperate with her captors but changes her mind after the demons threaten to capture Valkyrie`s comrade, http://anidb.net/perl-bin/animedb.pl?show=character&charid=45595 [Skuld], therefore she is ravaged and humiliated.
